backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining chatrooms, messages, users, reactions, and access control with storage integration and role management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing React Query refresh issues, involved files, components, and test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries of frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, shared layout, 404 handling, and theme provider for the app.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar selection dialog supporting uploads, Giphy search, trending GIFs, and avatar removal.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area component handling message fetching, auto‑scrolling, replies, sending messages, and pinned video display.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom card with media thumbnails, live status, and Twitter/Twitch preview fetching.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with fields, media upload, and video/Twitter URL validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing, ensuring no authentication is used.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media embedding, pinning, and Twitter widgets.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Input area for sending messages with support for images, video URLs, Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with unpin controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player component with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synchronized audio state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatrooms are freshly refetched once per actor lifecycle and removes legacy cache entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chatroom and messaging react-query hooks with caching, normalization, and local user metadata helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, layout rules, and custom UI styling including voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a compact number formatter converting large numbers into k, M, or B notation.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API and map results into a simplified GIF model with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality settings, and progress callbacks, returning a smaller File when beneficial.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to build a lightweight preview object with caching and duplicate-request prevention.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with versioning, validation, and expiration rules.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides utilities to extract IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generate corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page that authenticates via password and allows deletion of chatrooms using react-query with UI feedback and session-based auth state.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a chatroom, handles loading/error states, and increments view count once the chatroom data loads.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows chatroom list with search and category filters, manages debounced search, and forces fresh fetches when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing stale React Query chatroom lists.
